Package Users

Class UserManager

java.lang.Object
Utility.CSVReader
DataManager.UserDBManager
Users.UserManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserInterface
public class UserManager extends UserDBManager implements UserInterface
The UserManager class manages user-related operations in the Camp Application and Management System. It includes methods for reading user data from CSV files, hashing passwords, and modifying user information.

    • login

      public User login()
      Prompts the user to enter a user ID and password for authentication. Calls the authUser method to authenticate the user.
      Specified by:
      login in interface UserInterface
      Returns:
      The authenticated User object if successful, or null if authentication fails.

    • authUser

      public User authUser(String userId, String password)
      Authenticates a user based on the provided user ID and password. Returns the authenticated User object if successful, or null if authentication fails.
      Specified by:
      authUser in interface UserInterface
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID for authentication.
      password - The password for authentication.
      Returns:
      The authenticated User object, or null if authentication fails.

    • hash

      public static String hash(String data)
      Hashes the input string using the SHA-256 hash algorithm.
      Parameters:
      data - The input string to be hashed.
      Returns:
      The hashed string.
